May De Silva (Amụrụ n'ihe dị ka n'afọ ) bụ onye ọkachamara na njikwa Seychelles nke na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka Kọmishọna nke Kọmitii Anti-Corruption Seychelles kemgbe ọnwa Machị 16, 2017.
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Anse Royale, Mahé

Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ulster ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta postgraduate ya mgbe ọ gụsịrị Management na Executive Leadership. Ọ bụ onye otu International Boards na Panels dị iche iche gụnyere Gender Advisory Panel na Office of the First and Deputy First Minister of Northern Ireland, Belfast City Council for Good Relations Partnership ma ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Strategic Women's Reference Group nke Northern Ireland Policing Board

N'ụbọchị 16 Machị 2017, ọ nọchiri Lucy Athanasius dị ka Chief Executive Officer nke Anti-Corruption Commission Seychelles mgbe Danny Faure, Onye isi ala nke Republic of Seychelles, họpụtara ya. N'ọnwa Julaị 2020, a họpụtara Ms De Silva na Commission of Inquiry of the liquidation of the former Plantation Club Hotel nke onye bụbu onye isi oche nke ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị ikpe, Justice MacGregor na Auditor General, Maazị Gamini Herath na-eduzi
Ms De Silva bụkwa onye otu Seychelles National Committee of the Anti-Money Laundering and Counter Financing of Terrorism - nke a họpụtara n'ọnwa Febụwarị 2019.
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2021, ọrụ Ms De Silvaʹs gbanwere site na onye isi oche gaa na Kọmishọna nke Kọmitii Anti-Corruption Seychelles nke weghaara ikike ọhụrụ nke ilekọta Kọmitii Omume Ndị Ọchịchị
N'okwu ikpe dị elu, De Silva duziri nyocha nke onye bụbu minista Dolor Ernesta.
